firstPage.title: ALWAYS GIVE THE WORLD AND THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU THE BEST YOU CAN AND HAVE ... DESPITE EVERYTHING!

secondPage.main: Innovative and original business solutions that provide a number of advantages in the formation of competitiveness.
secondPage.First: is one of the established companies in Bulgaria, providing external services in the field of corporate governance, financial and accounting services, selection and management of personnel, legal and tax consulting. The company provides innovative and original business solutions that give customers a number of advantages in shaping their competitiveness.
secondPage.Second: ProAct was established in 2000 by specialists with many years of experience in studying and applying rules and principles of corporate governance. Initially, the company deals with accounting services and other administrative services related to the normal functioning of a company, but since its inception it has been constantly developing and growing.
secondPage.Tirth: Today the company applies its experience, acquires new knowledge and daily proves its qualifications and loyalty to its customers to be able as a consulting company to offer a wide range of services in the field of corporate governance.
